digest:
- *Atom-Searcher* enhances LLM reasoning with Atomic Thought, improving task efficiency and interpretability. More at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.12800
- *DegDiT* offers controllable audio generation with dynamic event graphs, enhancing temporal accuracy. Read more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.13786
- *InPars+* supercharges synthetic data generation for information retrieval, optimizing query quality. Details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.13930
- *SmartPath-R1* integrates ROI and WSI tasks for pathology, improving reasoning without costly annotations. Explore at https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.17303
- *TS-Agent* enhances financial time-series modeling with LLMs, improving adaptability and interpretability. Learn more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.13915
- *CORENet* uses LiDAR for noise reduction in 4D radar detection, improving autonomous driving robustness. More info at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.13485
- *X-MoE* optimizes Mixture-of-Experts training on HPC platforms, enhancing performance across diverse systems. Check it out at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.13337
- *CIV* ensures token integrity in LLMs, offering a novel security architecture. Details at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.09288
- *MedKGent* constructs evolving medical knowledge graphs with LLMs, enhancing biomedical research accuracy. Read more at https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.12393
- *RAPNet* introduces adaptive convolution for pansharpening, improving remote sensing image detail extraction. More at https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.10461
